label: Emission
comment: A calculation of the pollution (including noise, heat, and radiation etc.) discharged into the environment by a residential, commercial, or industrial facility or by a means of transport, such as a vessel, aircraft or truck.

objectProperties.comment: The affected distance over which this calculated emission is measured.

referencedBy.comment: A certified level of pollution calculated for an emission from this logistics transport means.
